channel.title: 40++ on Website Footprint
channel.description: Recent content in 40++ on Website Footprint

item.title: MyBlogU
item.description: MyBlogU is the innovative community of writers and bloggers who are eager to exchange their case studies, digital assets, expertise and knowledge to help each and get help in return!

item.title: Techsite
item.description: Naturally gain popularity in the tech community. Techsite.io is a free marketplace for publishing and discovering tech stories, software and startups.

item.title: LeasedAdSpace
item.description: Leased Ad Space is the most unique opportunity online. We give you the best marketing platform to sell whatever products or services you like. And with our affiliate program, you can make money from LeasedAdSpace, while also making money from your other offers!

item.title: Hashatit
item.description: Everywhere on social media, content is being generated at unheard of speeds. Hashtags help you navigate the ever-expanding internet, and HASHATIT keeps you on top of hashtags.

item.title: BootstrapBay
item.description: High quality Bootstrap themes & templates for your next web project.

item.title: InkTalks
item.description: INK is India’s foremost platform for the exchange of cutting-edge ideas and inspiring stories. Known for the annual INK Conference, INK Asia, INK Salons, and programs such as INK Fellows, we are a community that accelerates the journeys of the game changers.

item.title: Gendou
item.description: Gendou is an anime music database web application forum. Gendou is an big forum who allow people to talk, share and build community about anime and music.

item.title: Mifare
item.description: MIFARE® is NXP’s well-known brand for a wide range of contactless IC products with a typical read/write distance of 10 cm (4 inches) used in more than 40 different applications worldwide.

item.title: Opportunity
item.description: MyOpportunity.com is here to help by taking care of the search for you. The secret sauce lies within our advanced lead matching algorithms that connect users from our 5,000,000+ network to opportunities based on variables that identify ‘who needs who or what’ anywhere in the world at anytime. Results are reported in real-time so members can take immediate action.
